City Council
============

411 W. 8th Street Odessa TX 79761

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/411+W.+8th+Street+Odessa+TX+79761)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

411 W. 8th Street  
City Hall - 1st Floor  
Odessa, TX¬†79761

Mailing Address:

P.O. Box 4398  
Odessa, TX¬†79760
